user_question: What are the nutritional benefits of dragon fruit and generate an image of a dragon fruit smoothie?
final_answer: Dragon fruit is rich in antioxidants, vitamin C, and fiber. It supports immune health, aids digestion, and may improve heart health. Image of a dragon fruit smoothie generated. Dragon fruit smoothie recipe: 1 cup dragon fruit, 1 banana, 1/2 cup yogurt, 1/2 cup coconut milk, blend until smooth.
